pageContent: Background: Salvage Robot-Assisted Radical Prostatectomy (sRARP) has been described as feasible treatment for the management of localised prostate cancer (PCa) recurrence after primary treatment. However, no large reports have published cancer and quality outcomes.

metaData.source:
Conservative management of urorectal fistulae
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23528912/
